docs.title: I Have A Profile Picture
docs.text:
Here's my journey to create the Coding Armadillo logo.

After saying "Hello World" I struggled to make myself a pretty profile picture. Being no designer I tried to use an online tool to visualize my idea. And it came out like the following.

Luckily I stumbled across Emily's dribbble profile and loved her illustrative version of armadillo at first sight. We got in touch and she agreed to make me a profile picture. We started with a sketch.

We exchanged ideas and got a new sketch.

Then lovely colors were added!

Finally I have an awesome profile picture!

If you need some artwork done, please contact Emily. She's amazing!

docs.title: Kattis, Kattis
docs.text:
You can find some solutions from https://coding-armadillo.github.io/kattis/.

Feel free to check it out and send me solutions in PRs.

docs.title: Recent Web Apps
docs.text:
I have created two Django apps to help with kids around the block.

  1. Learn Music This is a collection of assignments for a local music school. It puts the instructions and recordings in one place so that the kids can easily practice even on a tablet or a phone.

  2. Good Neighbor Halloween https://good-neighbor-halloween.herokuapp.com This is a fun exercise to help planning an optimal route for trick-or-treat within a group of participating households.

Happy hacking!

docs.title: Rework GitHub Page with Material for MkDocs
docs.text: I am reworking my GitHub Pages with Material for MkDocs, ditching Gatsby.
